buy gas.title: BUY GAS FOR DSP
buy gas.subtitle: Provide amount, consumer address, and DSP account to fund a DSP to use DAPP Network jobs & services.

previews.name: DAPP
previews.short: DAPP token adjusted for 4 decimal precision.

previews.name: Consumer
previews.short: Address of consuming account or contract.

previews.name: DSP
previews.short: DSP address to buy DAPP gas for.

previews.name: DAPP
previews.short: DAPP token adjusted for 4 decimal precision.

previews.name: DSP
previews.short: DSP address to sell DAPP gas for.

request job.title: REQUEST JOB
request job.subtitle: Submit a job for the DAPP Workers to do.

previews.name: OWNER
previews.short: Address requesting job.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image job will use.

previews.name: INPUT
previews.short: Input command for docker image.

previews.name: CALLBACK
previews.short: Is there a contract callback required for the job?

previews.name: GAS LIMIT
previews.short: Gas limit for running job

previews.name: UNIFORM RESPONSE
previews.short: Require all DSP outputs to match.

previews.name: ARGUMENTS
previews.short: Arguments to provide docker image comma separated.

request service.title: REQUEST SERVICE
request service.subtitle: Submit a service for the DAPP Workers to provide.

previews.name: OWNER
previews.short: Address requesting service.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image service will use.

previews.name: UPLOAD/DOWNLOAD MB
previews.short: Amount in megabytes of upload/download bandwidth.

previews.name: STORAGE MB
previews.short: Amount in megabytes of total storage for the service.

previews.name: INPUT
previews.short: Input command for docker image.

previews.name: ARGUMENTS
previews.short: Arguments to provide docker image comma separated.

previews.name: MONTHS
previews.short: Months to provide service for, covers base cost, DOES NOT multiply upload/download/storage costs.

extend service.title: EXTEND SERVICE
extend service.subtitle: Extend existing service time, upload/download limit, and or storage limit.

previews.name: SERVICE ID
previews.short: ID of service to extend.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image service used.

previews.name: MONTHS
previews.short: Months to extend service for, covers base cost, DOES multiply upload/download/storage costs per month.

previews.name: UPLOAD/DOWNLOAD MB
previews.short: Amount in megabytes of upload/download bandwidth.

previews.name: STORAGE MB
previews.short: Amount in megabytes of additional storage for the service.

jobs.title: CONSUMER JOBS
jobs.subtitle: List of all jobs requested by consumer.

services.title: CONSUMER SERVICES
services.subtitle: List of all services requested by consumer.

set consumer.title: SET CONSUMER
set consumer.subtitle: Set consumer to use DAPP gas of user.

previews.name: CONSUMER CONTRACT
previews.short: Contract address to consumer DAPP Gas for jobs and services.

set dsps.title: SET DSPS
set dsps.subtitle: Select DAPP Workers to provide jobs/services.

previews.name: DSPS
previews.short: List of DSP addresses to use for jobs/services.

register.title: REGISTER DSP
register.subtitle: Register DSP endpoint and ability to be selected for jobs and services.

previews.name: endpoint
previews.short: DSP Endpoint providing DSP API for services.

deprecate.title: DEPRECATE DSP
deprecate.subtitle: Deprecate DSP, null endpoint, remove ability to be selected for jobs/services.

register image.title: REGISTER IMAGE
register image.subtitle: Register image and cost amounts for an existing image.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image to register.

previews.name: JOB FEE
previews.short: Fee required to perform job..

previews.name: BASE FEE
previews.short: Base fee for time providing service.

previews.name: STORAGE FEE
previews.short: Fee per mb of storage used.

previews.name: I/O FEE
previews.short: Fee per mb of upload/download bandwidth provided.

previews.name: MIN STORAGE MB
previews.short: Min storage in mb to provide service.

previews.name: MIN I/O MB
previews.short: Min i/o in mb to provide service.

update image.title: UPDATE IMAGE
update image.subtitle: Update image attributes for consumers whom selected this image.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image to update.

previews.name: JOB FEE
previews.short: Fee required to perform job..

previews.name: BASE FEE
previews.short: Base fee for time providing service.

previews.name: STORAGE FEE
previews.short: Fee per mb of storage used.

previews.name: I/O FEE
previews.short: Fee per mb of upload/download bandwidth provided.

previews.name: MIN STORAGE MB
previews.short: Min storage in mb to provide service.

previews.name: MIN I/O MB
previews.short: Min i/o in mb to provide service.

jobs.title: DAPP WORKER JOBS
jobs.subtitle: List DSP jobs that include this DSP.

services.title: DAPP WORKER SERVICES
services.subtitle: List DSP services that include this DSP.

previews.name: PAYMENT PREMIUM PPB
previews.short: Payment premium multiplier in 2 decimal precision.

previews.name: GAS CEILING MULT
previews.short: Multiplier to be paid above current gas prices.

previews.name: FALLBACK GAS PRICE
previews.short: Fallback gas price if chainlink fails.

previews.name: STAILNESS SECONDS
previews.short: Seconds before latest chainlink price feed goes stale.

approve image.title: APPROVE IMAGE
approve image.subtitle: Approve image for use by DAPP Workers.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image to approve.

previews.name: IMAGE HASH
previews.short: Hash of docker image to approve

unapprove image.title: UNAPPROVE IMAGE
unapprove image.subtitle: Unapprove image for use by DAPP Workers.

previews.name: IMAGE
previews.short: Docker image to unapprove.
